recipesJson.name: Red Mango cream
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: Just a nice bright flavorful Juicy mango ice cream . The strawberries boost the flavors and the Tangerine takes some of the harshness from the mango away, making it very delectable. The lemon Sicily adds a nice sweet citrus note to the recipe. This recipe can be shared and vaped. Best after 2 day to really meld together. Mixed at 70/30.
